full_text:
There is hereby established, pursuant to Raleigh City Charter §22 [§2.14] a Raleigh Arts Commission, as the official municipal advisory body on the arts broadly defined, which will promote, coordinate and strengthen public programs to further the cultural development of the City. 
(Ord. No. 1977-578, §1, 7-5-77)

3.name: PART 9 - PARKS, RECREATION AND CULTURAL AFFAIRS
3.label: part

plain_text:
CODE OF STATE

COMMISSION CREATED. (§ 9-10001)

There is hereby established, pursuant to Raleigh City Charter §22 [§2.14] a
Raleigh Arts Commission, as the official municipal advisory body on the arts
broadly defined, which will promote, coordinate and strengthen public programs
to further the cultural development of the City. 
(Ord. No. 1977-578, §1, 7-5-77)
